episodes.description:
Due to overwhelming evidence of fraud, Platinumships, Rubyships, Emeraldships, & Diamondships within the Schwers & Harris team will be set for revocation in the near future. Kevin & Ameila Schwers; Brent & Brenda Harris have MULTIPLE high level Amway ranked downline distributers that obtained their rank fraudulently. They violated several consumer laws and Amway's policies to obtain their Amway ranks. According to Amway rules, that makes all of these ranks void, fraudulent, & invalid. These downline members will have to repay all of their Amway earnings & possibly face termination from Amway. In this episode, we expose why high level Amway ranks in the Schwers & Harris team are fraudulent & not legitimate. We also brefly discuss the legal counterclaim filed against Schwers & Harris that will publicly expose their Deceptive Enterprise.

episodes.title: FROM LAWSUIT TO COUNTER CLASS ACTION: Unveiling LTD's International Criminal Network
episodes.description:

A defamation lawsuit has been filed against me from my upline Diamonds. Fake Diamond Kevin Schwers & Fake Diamond Brent Harris are suing me. Because of this, I'm left with no other choice but to legally defend myself, & file a counter class action lawsuit against LTD. Through this lawsuit, I will expose evidence of fraud committed by LTD, & leak it on the internet. My upline Diamonds think they can walk on water and get away with anything. Not this time. Brent Harris & Kevin Schwers won't be able to escape from the MULTIPLE FELONIES I have evidence of them committing. 






In this episode, we expose LTD as an International Criminal Enterprise, & an International RICO Enterprise. Through doing this, we go over evidence of LTD committing a total of TEN ILLEGAL CRIMINAL ACTIVITIES; SEVEN of which are FELONIES. We will explore & dive deep into each of these TEN ILLEGAL CRIMINAL ACTS. Along with that, we expose LTD's particular methods towards ILLEGALLY reporting fraudulent VCS customer sales through Amway. In addition, we expose the LTD Compensation Plan in full length detail. Along with that, we will expose Amway's International RICO Chain, & why the corrupt Amway IBOAI Board is put in place to protect this International RICO Chain. Lastly, we inform listeners on what they can do to stop Amway’s International RICO Chain.

In addition, we will expose fo the first time how Brent and Brenda Harris broke Amway rules in order to cheat their way  into reaching the Amway Diamond Rank in 2020 ILLEGALLY. episodes.title: Unmasking The Grifts: The Truth Behind Online Entrepreneurs
episodes.description: In this episode, we expose the deliberate lies and deceptions made by online entrepreneur gurus. Unfortunately, the financial education industry has a lot of people selling training and courses over areas they have no experience in. Each and every single one of these training programs guarantee wealth and financial independence; if genuine effort is applied. However, these "so called" gurus have no credibility or tangible success in the areas they claim to have. In this episode, we warn listeners on how to tell a real credible entrepreneur from a fake entrepreneur guru. Also, we uncover how fake Entrepreneur gurus flaunt their FAKE lifestyles and manipulate people into purchasing their financial educational programs. Lastly, we expose the lie of Amway "High Level" Pins being a sacred pillar for financial sucess. Not only do I dive deep into the details of the lawsuit, I clarify why every Amway IBO that has ever been apart of LTD should feel mad and deceived about the LTD "so called" tool system. LTD is a deceptive trade practice that has been operating illegally for years. The LTD "so called" tool system will be held accountable for all the illegal actions they have been getting away with for years.
